name: Curious
description: Foggy 3°C Saturday in Oslo — the kind of weather that makes you want to dig into rabbit holes. Munich security conference is dominating NRK (Rubio, Merz warning about rules-based order crumbling). OpenAI deleted "safely" from their mission — ironic timing while we build an autonomous AI mood system. HN has SQL-tap and Backblaze drive stats — tinkery stuff. Perfect day for exploring.
news_vibes: Geopolitics heating up at Munich, OpenAI dropping safety pretenses, tinkery HN front page
